title: Display correct answer on game over and increase timer to 12 seconds

requirements.summary: Display the correct answer option on the game over screen when the user loses
acceptanceCriteria: When game over occurs due to wrong answer or timeout, the GameOverScreen component displays the correct answer text
The correct answer is visually highlighted or clearly labeled in Persian
The correct answer display is integrated into the existing game over screen layout

file_operations.description: Add correctAnswer field to GameState interface to store the correct answer text when game over occurs
Update handleAnswer and handleTimeout functions to store the correct answer text in the gameState when setting game over, using currentQuestion.options[currentQuestion.correctAnswer]

Add display of the correct answer below the game over message using the correctAnswer from gameState, with clear Persian label 'جواب درست:' and visually distinct styling using the warm orange/yellow color palette

requirements.summary: Increase the countdown timer duration from 7 seconds to 12 seconds per question
acceptanceCriteria: Each question displays a 12-second countdown timer instead of 7 seconds
Timer visual feedback (colors for urgency states) adjusts appropriately for the new duration
Game over still triggers when timer reaches zero

file_operations.description: Change the timer duration prop passed to QuizTimer component from 7 to 12 seconds
Adjust the urgency state thresholds to work appropriately with 12-second duration (e.g., urgent state when remaining time is less than 3 seconds, warning state when less than 6 seconds)

requirements.summary: Update the welcome screen text to reflect the new 12-second time limit
acceptanceCriteria: StartScreen component displays '۱۲ ثانیه' instead of '۷ ثانیه' in the time warning text
All references to the timer duration on the welcome screen are updated to 12 seconds

file_operations.description: Update the Persian text in the time warning section to display '۱۲ ثانیه' instead of '۷ ثانیه', ensuring RTL layout is preserved
